Submitter Information: LifeScan Europe, a Division of Cilag GmbH International
Regulation Name(s): Calculator/data processing module for clinical use
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Apple iOS devices (iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4, iPod Touch 3rd/4th Gen, iPad 1st/2nd Gen)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for OneTouch Reveal Diabetes Management Application software accessory for diabetes data management
Indications for Use Summary: Intended as a software accessory to the OneTouch Verio Sync Blood Glucose Monitoring System for home use by people with diabetes to aid in review, analysis, and evaluation of patient data to support diabetes management
